result.title: Nintendo Today!
result.description:
Nintendo Today! is an app that brings you daily updates from Nintendo based on what you like.

◆ Animated Calendar
Keep track of the date with an animated calendar! Choose from themes featuring Super Mario, The Legend of Zelda, Animal Crossing, and more.

◆ Daily Updates
Get updates on all things Nintendo – including Nintendo Switch 2 news, game info, videos, comics, and more – every day.

◆ Event Schedule
Keep up with Nintendo-related events, including game releases. Link with the Google Calendar app to display your own events as well.

◆ Customise Your Home Screen
Add a calendar widget featuring art from your favourite Nintendo game series.

[Terms of Use]
Nintendo Account and persistent internet connection required. Data charges may apply.
Requires Android 9.0 or later.

Please note: this app's content currently uses U.S. English but may be updated to feature British English in the future.

© Nintendo

result.recentChanges:
■ Linking with the Google Calendar app
Link the in-app calendar with your Google Calendar app to see scheduled Nintendo events, like game release dates, alongside your personal events.

■ Favorites
Set content as a favorite by tapping the Favorite button. You can filter your News and Browsing History to display only your favorites.

■ You can now zoom in on images.
